text: The End of St. Petersburg () is a 1927 Soviet drama movie directed by Vsevolod Pudovkin and Mikhail Doller.ЦДК, Пионер и Storytel запустили цикл "Отражения" о нестандартном советском кино«Отражение» покажет необычные и редкие фильмы, снятые в СССР It stars Alexander Chistyakov, Vera Baranovskaya, and Ivan Chuvelev. ==Actors== *Alexander Chistyakov - Bolshevik worker *Vera Baranovskaya - His wife *Ivan Chuvelev - Peasant boy *Sergey Komarov - Bailiff *Nikolai Khmelyov - Speculator *Alexander Gromov - Bald Bolshevik == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian silent movies Category:1927 drama movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Vsevolod Pudovkin Category:Movies directed by Mikhail Doller
title: The End of St. Petersburg
